version_description:
App interface is now translated in japanese.
In-App subscription has been made easier.

App interface is now translated in japanese.
In-App subscription has been made easier.

App interface is now translated in japanese.
In-App subscription has been made easier.

- Addition of 4 new modules (Hand MR, Brain and face CT, Male pelvis MR, Brachial plexus MR)
- Gesture has changed (scroll with one finger when not zoomed, pan when zoomed)
- Some modules have cross references

- Few bugs fixed

- Addition of 4 new modules (Hand MR, Brain and face CT, Male pelvis MR, Brachial plexus MR)
- Gesture has changed (scroll with one finger when not zoomed, pan when zoomed)
- Some modules have cross references

- Few bugs fixed

- Addition of 4 new modules (Hand MR, Brain and face CT, Male pelvis MR, Brachial plexus MR)
- Gesture has changed (scroll with one finger when not zoomed, pan when zoomed)
- Some modules have cross references

- Few bugs fixed

Viewzone is now available for everyone again.
Crashes are fixed.

Viewzone is now available for everyone again.
Crashes are fixed.

Viewzone is now available for everyone again.
Crashes are fixed.

New :
-Long tap on a label to enter search mode for this structure.
-Rotations, in the settings panel you can now rotate your image by 90° clockwise and counterclockwise, you can also combine with vertical and horizontal mirror to get the best angle for your image.
-Reset button, In the settings panel you can use this button to reset all the settings to their defaults.
-Credits page, you will find it in the profile.
-Added a subtitle for each image which helps you understand the anatomical context.
-Added the parent structure on the search results if two structures have the same name.

Updates:
-Added module's name in the bookmarks list.
-Bookmarks are more visible.
-Minor bug fixes

New :
-Long tap on a label to enter search mode for this structure.
-Rotations, in the settings panel you can now rotate your image by 90° clockwise and counterclockwise, you can also combine with vertical and horizontal mirror to get the best angle for your image.
-Reset button, In the settings panel you can use this button to reset all the settings to their defaults.
-Credits page, you will find it in the profile.
-Added a subtitle for each image which helps you understand the anatomical context.
-Added the parent structure on the search results if two structures have the same name.

Updates:
-Added module's name in the bookmarks list.
-Bookmarks are more visible.
-Minor bug fixes

New :
-Long tap on a label to enter search mode for this structure.
-Rotations, in the settings panel you can now rotate your image by 90° clockwise and counterclockwise, you can also combine with vertical and horizontal mirror to get the best angle for your image.
-Reset button, In the settings panel you can use this button to reset all the settings to their defaults.
-Credits page, you will find it in the profile.
-Added a subtitle for each image which helps you understand the anatomical context.
-Added the parent structure on the search results if two structures have the same name.

Updates:
-Added module's name in the bookmarks list.
-Bookmarks are more visible.
-Minor bug fixes

New :
- Forgot password button in the profile screen
- Update cross references design with new feedback when not clickable.
- We now display the list of underlying anatomical structures in the description popup.
- Long press on the images of the details view to display the related module's name.

Bug fixes :
- Fixed a crash appearing on launch sometimes on iPad 2 and iPad 3
- The subtitle of the slice is now in the structure language.
- Fixed some problems with the search function.
- Minor bug fixes.

New :
- Forgot password button in the profile screen
- Update cross references design with new feedback when not clickable.
- We now display the list of underlying anatomical structures in the description popup.
- Long press on the images of the details view to display the related module's name.

Bug fixes :
- Fixed a crash appearing on launch sometimes on iPad 2 and iPad 3
- The subtitle of the slice is now in the structure language.
- Fixed some problems with the search function.
- Minor bug fixes.

New :
- Forgot password button in the profile screen
- Update cross references design with new feedback when not clickable.
- We now display the list of underlying anatomical structures in the description popup.
- Long press on the images of the details view to display the related module's name.

Bug fixes :
- Fixed a crash appearing on launch sometimes on iPad 2 and iPad 3
- The subtitle of the slice is now in the structure language.
- Fixed some problems with the search function.
- Minor bug fixes.

New :
-You can now use Facebook or Google to sign in to the app.
-The practice mode is now available in the lateral panel while viewing a module. (Structure's names will be replaced with numbers and you can tap on it to display them)
-You can now tap outside the details view of an anatomical structure to close it.

Anatomy :
-Redesign and new nomenclature of coronary arteries for the module of the coronary angiogram and coronary CT. The anatomical terms are now more adapted to angiographic nomenclature and to cardiac imaging practice.

Updates :
-The search system now returns more relevant images (searched word is in the image name or series name).
-The details view now returns more relevant images (searched word is in the image name or series name).
-Fixed long loadings at first start of the app.
-Fixed small bugs

New :
-You can now use Facebook or Google to sign in to the app.
-The practice mode is now available in the lateral panel while viewing a module. (Structure's names will be replaced with numbers and you can tap on it to display them)
-You can now tap outside the details view of an anatomical structure to close it.

Anatomy :
-Redesign and new nomenclature of coronary arteries for the module of the coronary angiogram and coronary CT. The anatomical terms are now more adapted to angiographic nomenclature and to cardiac imaging practice.

-The search system now returns more relevant images (searched word is in the image name or series name).

-Fixed long loadings at first start of the app.
-Fixed small bugs

New :
-You can now use Facebook or Google to sign in to the app.
-The practice mode is now available in the lateral panel while viewing a module. (Structure's names will be replaced with numbers and you can tap on it to display them)
-You can now tap outside the details view of an anatomical structure to close it.

-Redesign and new nomenclature of coronary arteries for the module of the coronary angiogram and coronary CT. The anatomical terms are now more adapted to angiographic nomenclature and to cardiac imaging practice.

-The search system now returns more relevant images (searched word is in the image name or series name).
-The details view now returns more relevant images (searched word is in the image name or series name).
-Fixed long loadings at first start of the app.
-Fixed small bugs

New :
-A new tab named "QuickLinks" is available, dispatching modules in sections of the human body and allowing you to fast travel to the modules you are looking for.
-The interface has been reworked to fit iOS 11 style.
-Added support for iPhone X layout.

Anatomy :
Two new modules : Brain - TOF and Brain Angiography, Atlas of normal neurovascular anatomy of arteries of the brain on a cerebral angiogaphy.

Updates :
-Fixed a bug with 3D touch causing the labels to disappear.
-Fixed cross app linking with Vet Anatomy in the détails view of an anatomical structure.
-Fixed disconnection errors.
-Fixed small bugs

New :
-A new tab named "QuickLinks" is available, dispatching modules in sections of the human body and allowing you to fast travel to the modules you are looking for.
-The interface has been reworked to fit iOS 11 style.
-Added support for iPhone X layout.

Anatomy :
Two new modules : Brain - TOF and Brain Angiography, Atlas of normal neurovascular anatomy of arteries of the brain on a cerebral angiogaphy.

Updates :
-Fixed a bug with 3D touch causing the labels to disappear.
-Fixed cross app linking with Vet Anatomy in the détails view of an anatomical structure.
-Fixed disconnection errors.
-Fixed small bugs

New :
-A new tab named "QuickLinks" is available, dispatching modules in sections of the human body and allowing you to fast travel to the modules you are looking for.
-The interface has been reworked to fit iOS 11 style.
-Added support for iPhone X layout.

Anatomy :
Two new modules : Brain - TOF and Brain Angiography, Atlas of normal neurovascular anatomy of arteries of the brain on a cerebral angiogaphy.

Updates :
-Fixed a bug with 3D touch causing the labels to disappear.
-Fixed cross app linking with Vet Anatomy in the détails view of an anatomical structure.
-Fixed disconnection errors.
-Fixed small bugs

New :
-Added two new buttons on the details view of a structure, the first allows to launch the search mode for this structure, the second will only select the structures associated with this structure
-The date format of the subscription expiration date now conforms to your device region date format
-Modules icons reviewed
-You can now quit search mode by taping the close button next to the searched structure label

Updates :
-Fixed search not working with non latin characters (Japanese and Chinese)
-Fixed a bug that displayed a connection problem
-Fixed small bugs

New :
-Added two new buttons on the details view of a structure, the first allows to launch the search mode for this structure, the second will only select the structures associated with this structure
-The date format of the subscription expiration date now conforms to your device region date format
-Modules icons reviewed
-You can now quit search mode by taping the close button next to the searched structure label

-Fixed search not working with non latin characters (Japanese and Chinese)
-Fixed a bug that displayed a connection problem
-Fixed small bugs

Updates :
-Fixed search not working with non latin characters (Japanese and Chinese)
-Fixed a bug that displayed a connection problem
-Fixed small bugs

New module : Anatomical atlas of the lumbar spine on a CT, intervertebral discs and lumbosacral hinge in axial, coronal, and sagittal sections, and on 3D images
New language : German is now supported for anatomical structures

Fixes :
-Fixed a bug disconnecting users
-Fixed small bugs
-Fixed default sizes of images when entering a module so no points appear outside the view.

New module : Anatomical atlas of the lumbar spine on a CT, intervertebral discs and lumbosacral hinge in axial, coronal, and sagittal sections, and on 3D images
New language : German is now supported for anatomical structures

-Fixed a bug disconnecting users
-Fixed small bugs
-Fixed default sizes of images when entering a module so no points appear outside the view.

-Fixed small bugs
-Fixed default sizes of images when entering a module so no points appear outside the view.

New subscription method : Monthly subscription.
-The search function is now more fluid on iPhone devices.

-Fixed on the search engine on iPhone devices.
-Fixed default sizes of images when entering a module so no points appear outside the view.
-Fixed minor bugs

New : On the modules screen you can now see the recently opened modules.

Fixes and enhancements :

-Image loading optimization in the gallery
-Performance enhancements

-Image loading optimization in the gallery
-Performance enhancements

New:

-The Korean language is now available for the app and the anatomical structures.

-New module for subscribers : Atlas of anatomy of the intra and extrahepatic biliary tree, the common bile duct (CBP, Ductus choledocus), the gallbladder and pancreatic ductal system (duct of Wirsung) on MRI (MR cholangiopancreatography)

Updates:

-Number of small bug fixes

New:

-The Korean language is now available for the app and the anatomical structures.

-New module for subscribers : Atlas of anatomy of the intra and extrahepatic biliary tree, the common bile duct (CBP, Ductus choledocus), the gallbladder and pancreatic ductal system (duct of Wirsung) on MRI (MR cholangiopancreatography)

Updates:

-Number of small bug fixes

New:

-The Korean language is now available for the app and the anatomical structures.

-New module for subscribers : Atlas of anatomy of the intra and extrahepatic biliary tree, the common bile duct (CBP, Ductus choledocus), the gallbladder and pancreatic ductal system (duct of Wirsung) on MRI (MR cholangiopancreatography)

Updates:

-Number of small bug fixes

New :
-New module for premium users, Shoulder MR arthrogram: anatomy of the normal glenohumeral joint and rotator cuff
-When searching for structures, viewing a structure’s details does not stop your search.
-On iPad, on the search results, a long press on a structure will display a short preview of it (a simple tap to open the détails is still working)

Fixes :
-Fixed a bug preventing some anatomical structures to be added as a bookmark
-Minor bugs in presentation mode
-General fix

New :
-New module for premium users, Shoulder MR arthrogram: anatomy of the normal glenohumeral joint and rotator cuff
-When searching for structures, viewing a structure’s details does not stop your search.
-On iPad, on the search results, a long press on a structure will display a short preview of it (a simple tap to open the détails is still working)

Fixes :
-Fixed a bug preventing some anatomical structures to be added as a bookmark
-Minor bugs in presentation mode
-General fix

New :
-New module for premium users, Shoulder MR arthrogram: anatomy of the normal glenohumeral joint and rotator cuff
-When searching for structures, viewing a structure’s details does not stop your search.
-On iPad, on the search results, a long press on a structure will display a short preview of it (a simple tap to open the détails is still working)

Fixes :
-Fixed a bug preventing some anatomical structures to be added as a bookmark
-Minor bugs in presentation mode
-General fix

-Fixed a bad subscription expiration display for people using institutional subscriptions
-The tools, colors and brush size you selected on presentation mode are now saved between sessions
-Fixed bad japanese translations
-Minor bug fixes

-New modules for premium users:
Thorax CT (lungs and mediastinum): anatomy atlas in computed tomography imaging
Normal MRI of inner ear and internal auditory canal

-New modules for all users:
Nose and paranasal sinuses anatomical illustrations
Buccal cavity (mouth) anatomical illustrations
Upper limb catheter angiography
Radiological anatomy of the thorax and conventional radiography of the abdomen-pelvis
Angiography of the lower limb (DSA)

-You can now use your e-Anatomy app on Mac computers with Apple silicon
-You can now use the external keyboard associated to your device to use shortcuts, check them all using the cmd key
-You can now suggest a description or a translation if you wish to contribute to e-Anatomy (In the details view of an anatomical structure)
-Some labels now use the "Terminologia Anatomica Second Edition"
-Added the reverse scroll option in the Advanced settings section
-Numerous fixes and improvements
-Fixed "module name not found" in German

Angiography of the lower limb (DSA)
